rationale: Segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: No human cases of the avian influenza virus have been detected in the United States. It remains safe to eat poultry products.

rationale: No high-potency verb, alert phrase, metaphor, or superlative/intensifier + harm noun.
statement_text: No human cases of the avian influenza virus have been detected in the United States. It remains safe to eat poultry products.

rationale: No moderate verb from the list paired with explicit scale/impact.
statement_text: No human cases of the avian influenza virus have been detected in the United States. It remains safe to eat poultry products.

rationale: Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
statement_text: No human cases of the avian influenza virus have been detected in the United States. It remains safe to eat poultry products.
